item.title: Lock your screen on SwayWM
item.description: SwayWM users can use swaylock to lock their screen. Place the following key binding in your Sway configuration: # lock your screen bindsym $mod+Ctrl+l exec swaylock --color 000000 $mod+Ctrl+l will lock your screen and turn it to black. The --color flag allows any color in the form of rrggbb[aa].
